api_list.name: Get the total number of curiosity
api_list.description: Returns the count. The total number of curiosities available, so that you can move with your offset from 0 to count - 1.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com/count_posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com/count_posts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "curiosity2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
